ratings.comment: This professor not only upsetted me because he talked down to you, but he also made no effort to fix mistakes. The TA didn't help of course, but all I have to say is...A going into final, B coming out, are you KIDDING me?!

A nice guy and decent prof, although watch out for the accent. Lectures were okay (except being early), but he just does examples from the book so if you're a fan of reading rather than hearing i wouldn't go. The exams are rough but fair ... the curve helps.
Questions were much more advanced than material taught
Excellent professor if you are willing to work hard.  If you need to be spoon-fed, find someone else.

His accent makes the class unclear at times. If you don't pay attention it is easy to get lost. He does a good job of helping you understand something if you ask the right question. The class is hard to understand, but i don't think that's his fault.
Hard to understand because of the accent but you'll probably get used to it after a while (a little bit at least).  He can be hard to follow because of this at times.
Very nice, and tries to help you.  He's kind of difficult to understand at first, but you get used to the accent.  Just not very clear in his lecture-approach.  (Class is all calculus theory.)
